alert.note: Alert for Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Newton County Higher Elevations; Searcy County Lower Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 4:48PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Searcy and eastern Newton Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 447 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Eula, or 14 miles west of Marshall, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marsena... Eula... Bohannon... Witts Spring... Point Peter... Canaan... Snowball... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Newton County Higher Elevations; Searcy County Lower Elevations
